content:
/>
X.v.2.B.1.i
.
Proper Effective Date for a Grant of Entitlement to an Increased Disability Rating or SC
If, in connection with a request for reinstatement of disability compensation following discharge, a Veteran files, and VA grants, a claim for
an increased disability rating, assign an effective date in accordance with the instructions in
M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, 4.A.5.f
SC for a new disability, assign an effective date in accordance with the instructions in
M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, 4.A.3.a
, or
SC for a disability for which VA previously denied SC, assign an effective date in accordance with the instructions in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 2.A
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 2, Section B  - Award Adjustments Necessitated by a Veteran's Return to and Discharge From Active Duty
citation: Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 2, Section B
